list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Section 22.369(Working with Databases: CallableStatement, OUT and IN/OUT parameters): experimenting with in, inout parameters in stored procedures
experiencing strange behavior when leaving in/inout parameters undefined, and how to retrieve inout/out information for calling code

task.summary:
Section 22.365(Working with Databases: Prepared Statement): writing lots of code for artist-album-song insert prepared statements with introduction of the PreparedStatement class
copied 'printRecords' from MusicDML class of earlier lesson

Section 22.366(Working with Databases: Prepared Statement, Continued): added reading from .csv in project's root directory, method "addDataFromFile"
includes Files.readAllLines(Path.of(stringPathFileName)); creating loot/iter through all data, re-using all three PreparedStatements

Section 22.368(Working with Databases: CallableStatement):
introduced to stored procedures; example SQL script (see episode resources),
took this opportunity to pick apart the I/O Collectors, lambda functions, and Stream<T> code/methods demonstrated here by referring to documentation;
ran example CallableStatement for stored procedure (input only)

Section 22.369(Working with Databases: CallableStatement, OUT and IN/OUT parameters): experimenting with in, inout parameters in stored procedures
experiencing strange behavior when leaving in/inout parameters undefined, and how to retrieve inout/out information for calling code
